verbs.description: [ARG0: council] [V: proposed] [ARG1: homeless housing mandate] does n't add up the city council members stepping up to mandate the mass construction of apartments for the homeless have their hearts squarely where they need to be with more than 60 000 people sleeping in the city shelters and streets the tragedy of homelessness shames this wealthy can - do city city council
